sections.general:
DIRECTOR OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
Executive Profile
Director of Information Technology Project Manager * Business Analyst * Technical Support Analyst Visionary and highly accomplished
Information Technology executive with success spanning 20+ years in high-performance, multi-faceted environments. Innovative and quality-driven
professional to oversee enterprise resource planning, data and voice networking, software development, performance analysis and other critical
business processes. Expertise establishing strategies and spearheading long-term initiatives to devise deploy and support IT infrastructures in
alignment with business objectives. Adept administrator of enterprise projects and organizational budgets.
Skill Highlights
Innovative Leadership
Change Management
Infrastructure Design
Strategic Planning
Technology Development
Collaboration and Liaison
P & L Oversight
Organizational Development
Mentoring and Coaching
